description:
Zhong Shanshan (Chinese: 钟睒睒; pinyin: Zhōng Shǎnshǎn, born 1954) is a Chinese businessman.
He is the founder and chairperson of the Nongfu Spring beverage company and the majority owner of Beijing Wantai Biological Pharmacy Enterprise.
As of 2022, he is ranked the wealthiest person in China, garnering a net worth of $62.3 billion. His source of wealth is derived mainly from his business stakes and interests in the Chinese beverage and pharmaceutical industries.
